Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    The transaction class is contains all the functions and variables needed for the transaction for the distributed database, including locks.
    Author:
    Wenzhao Zang, Dongbo Xiao
